name: CrazyDance
0:
”Alexa, open Crazy Dance”
”Alexa, start Crazy Dance”
”Alexa, launch Crazy Dance”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: crazy dance
Developer Terms of Use
des: The game consist in walking around a circle of chairs while the music is playng. Then the music stops the goal for the players is to get a sit before the others. The number of the chairs is one less than the number of the player. The player who do not managed to get a seat remaens exclouded and looses. The winner is the player who seat in the last chairs left.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
